General.Name: K.C. Metalsheet Public Company Limited
General.Description: K.C. Metalsheet Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes metal sheets for roofing and other applications in Thailand. It also sells manufactured goods under the contract with customers; provides roof installation services with metal sheets and various steel goods; and provides property rental services. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Khon Kaen, Thailand.
